decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL.06 - REV- Proposed Plans 1; PL.07 - REV-B Proposed Plans 2; PL.08 - REV-B Proposed Elevations 1 and PL.09 - REV A Proposed Elevations 2 - Received: 23/10/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the side dormer roof extension shall be fixed, obscure glased and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscure glazing.
description: Erection of side and rear roof extensions to the house
